Definitely one of my favorite schooters on the pc. This game never really gets old,and even if it does,interest will spark up again after a short break. Fun factor does kinda depent  on the people you play with though,because a disoriented team can quickly fall if not working together properly. And we dont want those specimens killing the rest of humanity now,do we? For that low price,definitely buy!

WELL WORTH THE MONEY!
It will run on a netbook on Lowest settings!
So fun to play with friends.
GET IT.

TripWire nous livre un titre exigeant, qui laissera sans doute sur le carreau les joueurs les moins persévérants. Plus brut, plus basique dans son concept, mais aussi plus hardcore qu'un certain Left 4 Dead, Killing Floor nous plonge avec efficacité en plein milieu d'une immense boucherie. Le plaisir est bel et bien là, de même que le sentiment d'oppression et d'urgence.
Awesome game! Definately worth it! ^^v
Killing waves after waves of zombies with friends...what else !
Good game, nuff said.
Love this game so much, probs my favorite game on steam. :)
Best $20 ever spent

Um FPS muito bom para jogar multiplayer online. Você e outros jogadores precisam trabalhar juntos para que muitas ondas de monstros sejam destruídas e no fim de cada horda, você deve correr para comprar armas, munição e proteção em poucos segundos. Há um estímulo à cooperação: as chances de sobrevivência são maiores se todos se manterem juntos; um jogador pode curar o outro rapidamente; alguém com melhor desempenho (que mata mais) ganha mais dinheiro, mas pode oferecer uma parte ou todo ele para que outros possam se armar melhor. O último chefe é bem difícil e o melhor é montar uma estratégia para que você e sua equipe não fiquem vulneráveis quando ele aparecer. A dificuldade é maior quando se tem menos pessoas na equipe. Apenas o ruim é que não há uma campanha ou um modo single player, além do visual já estar um pouco ultrapassado, mesmo assim, não deixa de ser imersivo.
What can I say this game takes all the zombie games i love plus the horrors  of walking along dark areas just to turn the corner to get ambushed by a horde of these creatures is a must get game.
Best zombie survival horror!
What a good game!
ゾンビ殲滅ゲー。レベル要素が面倒なとこではある。でも面白いね。
killing floor is fucking good
Killing Floor : de zombie game waarmee je echt moet samenwerken om te kunnen overleven

Real Life Economy Simulator v2.3 is a great addition to the simulation table. The depth to the currency system is unmatched by other simulators. Give it a try, the upcoming trade expansion will let you enter debt or gain profit from trading with other countries for precious dosh.
Ah bollocks, ye wankers. If ye not be playin' this already. You be bloody fools!

Killing Floor is not for the faint of heart; bloodcrazed, morbid hordes of genetically mutated monsters are out for the hunt, and it is up to you and your group of friends to face them. Earn your cash by wiping out every last enemy from the incoming waves, and spend it carefully on the weapon of your choice. Multiple classes and their respective pieces of weaponry await. Score critical shots as a sharpshooter, blast your way open as a demolitionist, introduce yourself up close as a berserker or stand in the back row and heal your allies as a medic; whatever you do, your goals are simple. Kill all the monsters, and make your squad survive it.
killing floor is a co-op survival game that does its job well.  killing floor has a class-rpg system that work very well for this game.  i give this game a 5/5 (a must buy)

Killing Floor originally started as an Unreal Tournament mod, but has it's own, seperate game release. Experimental Specimans that are zombie like are running across the world. As a soldier, it's your job to clear them out. Fight advancing waves of specimens as they get tougher, pick perks to fight your style, and weapons as well. It's bloody, it's violent, it's a fun time! They're too soft to be a zombie! So shoot em good!

Mainly because a team of Six friends is always more effective than a team of four, the game could have a little more variance but having no good area to be in makes for some strong team work and excellent leadership with class based expertise. An easy favorite in my opinion. - JDM

If you like the cooperation of Left for Dead and the xpm! mod you'll love this game. 6 person co-op with a bit of rpg elements thrown in for good measure. Killing Floor was an Unreal Tournament 2004 mod YEARS before the first Left for Dead was released. Some of the infected Left for Dead enemies are near rip offs of the Killing Floor specimens. It's a great game.... you'll have a good time playing it. Even my wife loves it... : )
Nice co-op game with a nice feeling to it

Fucking awesome. Best Co-Op Survival Horror game I've ever played. Jump in, gear up, kill zeds. Simple, but has alot of replayability with its fine number of maps. The gunplay is fucking beast, shooting a zed with a shotgun has never been so satisfying. The graphics, on the other hand, isn't as nice. BUT YOU'RE TOO FUCKING BUSY MAKING GODDAMN HEADS EXPLODE YOU WON'T EVEN NOTICE. Must buy, totally worth the money you will spend.
awesome fps shooter .  co-op zombie shooter !!
So much fun - can always turn back to this game when every other game gets old and boring.

LOOOOOOADS A MONEYYYY. DOSH DOSH DOSH WAYNE ROONEY'S SMARTER THAN YOU. Some people call this the poor man's Left 4 Dead. Seeing how I have both the Left 4 Dead games I disagree with such a stupid statement. Killing Floor is nothing but pure, adrenaline rush madness. You and a group of players will battle it out against waves and waves of enemies until the final boss. That's it. Don't think it's simple. It's not. You have different classes and so many achievements. Each class is good at something, such as Medics (healing) and others being good with long range/melee/upclose and personal blasting. 

I love this game so much and the voice commands make this so much better than it actually is. Please, get this game. It's always at a good price/being put on sale and you're missing out on this gem if you don't get it!
Fucking Amazing. Nuff Nuff.

This is one of the best items on Steam.  With it, you can blow off some steam by killing wave after wave of mutated lab specimens!  In between waves, buy bigger guns then kill more specimens!  Gotta love it.

Dosn't get much more badass than this awesome game right here!!
And it becomes much more awesome if u play with friends ;)
Good graphics, no lag problem. No hacking.

LOADSAMONEY! A fun shooter with friends that's just clunky, ugly and British enough to be interesting. I personally have more fun playing it than Left 4 Dead 1 or 2 most of the time, though I would consider L4D a "better" game.

Do you like to blow yourself up with Pipebombs? 
Do you like to get your eardrums busted by high pitched screaming?
Do you like to get beaten, clawed, mauled and rocketed to death by a giant clone freak with mounted machine gun?

Then this is the game for you!
Good Game, buy this instead of LFD2, or LFD
Horde/Wave games dont get much better than this, all round, zombie killing fun. With skills that can be upgraded to add a few RPG elements in there

Killing Floor is definitely one of the greatest and most entertaining games I've ever played! Teaming up with your friends to survive endless waves of specimens, a wide range of different weaponry at your service,  the feeling of adrenaline pumping through your veins when you're the only one left! - Just amazing! This is a solid survival horror action game, with plenty hours of fun (fear), that every blood-hungering zombie fanatic should try.
Comparado a esse jogo, o inferno é mamadeira! Pretty badass game!

A brilliant alternative to Left 4 Dead with some of the best gunplay in the FPS genre. Also a frequent sale item.

Un surprenant co-op survival horror, clairement hardcore malgré des ennemis essentiellement contrôlé par IA, cela ne lui porte pas préjudice car les mécaniques de jeu s'y prêtent bien. Un des meilleurs ressentis des armes qui puissent exister, des dialogues et des voix amusantes.

À jouer avec ses amis, à petite dose car il reste assez répétitif.

Killing Floor is one of those games that you install every once in a while and just play acouple rounds. It's simplistic but  it just help boost it's charm, the characters are all British and all are quite funny, my favorite being Mr. Foster. It may seem a tad expensive for everything but that is really the only bad thing. If you are bored and have the cash, Killing Floor wouldn't be a bad investment.

This game is extremely fun! It's like Left 4 Dead, but on steriods. It's like Left 4 Dead, but more hardcore! It's fun to play alone, but it's a blast to play online! Really Great Game! I suggest you buy it. :D

A really fun post-apocalyptic zombie co-op game. Six specialist classes (called "perks"), each having seven experience levels. As you level up you gain abiliies and bonuses, levels 5 and 6 spawn with a weapon or armor. 

Six players per team against a zillion pissed-off zombies. They come in up to 10 progressively harder waves, with a final wave against the Patriarch.

See you there!
The altitude of fun in this game is dependent on how many friends you play with, more players = more fun.
If you like killing zombies, loads of blood, explosions, an arsenal of weapons, and a challenge to stay alive. Buy this game!

This game is by far the ONLY game that can rival Left 4 Dead and COD's Nazi Zombie modes.

Level up system, realistic shooting, excellent team based gameplay, and a nice grindhouse style presentation.

Definitely a must for fans of zombie shooters.
Игра в стиле Left 4 Dead, но со своей азартной атмосферой.
